content: crochet slip chain baby blanket - made in a lovely chunky warm yarn crocheted using a slip through half_double_crochet stitch the pattern instructions are in both usa and uk formats written in english please note that the pattern is available for free on my blog ** www crochetncreate com 1 ** size approx - 36 x 36 inches level intermediate copyright ©2025 crochetncreate do not sell reproduce or copy this pattern in any way you are welcome to sell anything you make from this pattern 1 https //crochetncreate com/slip-chain-baby-blanket/
